colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO SDOM PA'I RNAM PHRUL DPAL LDAN MGON PO ZHAL BZHI PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR BA'I CHO GA 'DI NI, `DZA YA PAntI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI BGYI BAS LA SOGS PA BZLOG BSGYUR NAS RIGS 'GRES NAS BYED PA LA, NYES STUNG GI TSOGS CI MCHIS YOD KUN BLA MA YI DAM LHA DANG DPAL MGON ZHAL BZHI PA 'KHOR DANG BCAS PAS BZOD PA BYAMS PAR MDZOD CING, ,'GRO KUN LA PHAN PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,DO TSA KHREL MED PA'I SEMS KYIS BGYIS PA DGE BAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
